heading: bbc newscaster slain
subheading: reports that a professional hitman may have murdered top bbc television personality jill dando, 37, who hosted a program that tracked down criminals. police say the newscaster was killed by a single gunshot to the head outside her london home. neighbors told police they saw a well-dressed man with a cellular phone fleeing the scene. prime minister tony blair said he was deeply shocked to hear the news, calling dando "totally charming and hugely talented." there had been press reports last year that dando was being harassed by a stalker.
author: wired staff
